narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Adnan Lab INC is a Intermediate Care Facility, Mental Illness provider based in Chicago, IL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $8.4M in Medicaid payments across 98K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $8.4M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
